title: How are people like Pallavi Ghosh able to write amazing answers? - Quora

response.answer_text: People can write his answers due to the Following reasons:  If they are experienced enough then they can write amazing answers.. Some people are gifted these ships by birth.. Some people write anything to their heart. Some people prefer bombastic style of writing and that makes their answers amazing.. Some people write simple and use examples, stories, poems, etcGenuine detail plays an important role here.. All that makes your answer good is simple way of writing and a bountiful of facts and examples to explain your answer...
